<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Horus (The Distant Falcon)](/Deities.aspx?ID=53)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Protect those you have authority over, maintain harmony in your community

**Anathema** Undermine a rightful ruler, serve a usurper

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, NG, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Khopesh](/Weapons.aspx?ID=290)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=2), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=21), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)

- **4th**
[Aerial Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=4)
(bird only)

</column>
name: Horus (The Distant Falcon)
